comments.body: For the new feature, we don't use Apache JIRA issue prefix. Please remove `SPARK-29227: `.
Let me just merge it since it's rather a nit.

No, @wenxuanguan ~ Only the JIRA ID.
> And also, do you mean add Apache JIRA issue info(prefix and title) in test name if it is bugfix?

> No, @wenxuanguan ~ Only the JIRA ID.
